page.title: 16Spare time in Eckington.
page.content: {David:-}In my spare time i like to go down to the river and catch minnows, water boatmen, and snails. I like watching cartoons on TV like God-Zilla and Captain Caveman; I also like helping Dad wash the car. Dad gardens, sleeps or goes to the pub in his spare time. Mum reads books in her spare time, sometimes Mum and Dad go down to the river and walk or sit and watch barges go through the locks. {Mark:-}In my spare time I ride my bike and watch TV. Blue Peter is my favourite. I go to cubs and swim which are good fun. I also like playing the piano. For Girls 9-10 years old, the most popular spare time activity is watching TV, then drawing and reading. For Boys 9-10 years old,the most popular activities are watching TV, playing sport and bike riding or cubs.
